metadata.name: Perky Pikas #1
metadata.description: 6,666 Perky Pikas have hit the Blockchain, ready to explore the Pikaverse! Join the Crew, stake your Pika and get $LEAFcoin, our custom token to be used for holder rewards. Hang on as we begin our journey in Pikaton and move through our PikaMap to unknown riches! Holders will receive FREE Pika Houses & Pika Babies! The Official Perky Pikas Game will be launched on January 15th! Time to Pika!!
